recipes.name: Moules Frites
instructions: Clean and debeard mussels
SautÃ© shallots in butter
Add mussels and white wine
Steam covered for 5-7 minutes
Fry potatoes until golden
Serve mussels with frites and parsley

instructions: Simmer chicken/fish and vegetables, finish with cream.

instructions: Mix ingredients, cook in waffle iron until golden.

instructions: Slice melon, wrap with ham, serve chilled.

instructions: Cook eel with onion, tomato, and wine until tender.

recipes.name: Koninginnehapje (Queen's Bite)

recipes.name: Witte Pens (White Sausage)

recipes.name: Kippenwaterzooi (Chicken Waterzooi)
instructions: Simmer chicken and vegetables, finish with cream.

recipes.name: Belgische Frieten (Belgian Fries)
instructions: Cut potatoes, fry twice until golden and crisp, season with salt.

recipes.name: Appelmoes (Belgian Applesauce)
instructions: Peel and chop apples, simmer with sugar, cinnamon, and lemon juice until soft, mash to desired consistency.
